name: Warren Buffett
quote: "Price is what you pay. Value is what you get."

name: Benjamin Graham
quote: "In the short run, the market is a voting machine but in the long run, it is a weighing machine."

name: Peter Lynch
quote: "Know what you own, and know why you own it."

name: Charlie Munger
quote: "The big money is not in the buying and selling, but in the waiting."

name: Ray Dalio
quote: "He who lives by the crystal ball will eat shattered glass."

name: John Templeton
quote: “The four most dangerous words in investing are: ‘This time it’s different.’”

name: George Soros
quote: “It’s not whether you’re right or wrong, but how much money you make when you’re right and how much you lose when you’re wrong.”

name: Howard Marks
quote: "You can’t predict, but you can prepare."

name: Jesse Livermore
quote: “The stock market is never obvious. It is designed to fool most of the people, most of the time.”

name: Jack Bogle
quote: “Don’t look for the needle in the haystack. Just buy the haystack.”

name: Paul Samuelson
quote: “Investing should be more like watching paint dry or watching grass grow.”

name: Seth Klarman
quote: “Risk comes from not knowing what you’re doing.”

name: Warren Buffett
quote: “Be fearful when others are greedy and greedy when others are fearful.”

name: Philip Fisher
quote: “The stock market is filled with individuals who know the price of everything, but the value of nothing.”

name: Mark Cuban
quote: “It doesn’t matter how many times you fail. You only have to be right once.”
